titleStmt.title: Philodemus, De aviditate (= P.Herc. 1077, Roll B)

revisionDesc.change: Finalized - Revised text and metadata. Added Dorandi's conjectures, P.Herc. specific metadata.

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - add lost.?lin at beginning and end of each frg. L.1.5 no reg required. L.1.6 end [.1].1 -> [.1-2]. L.1.7 |alt| -> |ed|. L.4.1 [.1].1 -> [.1-2]. L.4.7 ]ς -> ]σ
